Baldur's Gate 3 Early Access Q&A

When is early access available?

The Early Access version of Baldur's Gate 3 will be available on Steam, Stadia, and GOG on October 6th, 2020.

Which Dungeons & Dragons edition will Baldur's Gate 3 be based on?
